description:
Helia is Soleil`s grandmother and the former mistress of the Eclipse Castle in the Johto Region. Her title was transferred to her granddaughter after she successfully completed the Eclipse Festival ceremony.
Because of Luno`s failed coup attempt, his ancestors lived in secret for a long time. This was until Ilunas tried ambushing the castle. Soleil did not know of Ilunas until the day of the eclipse and she was sorry he had to endure so much hardship during his life.
name: Himari
